department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Suppliers will provide lumber and small hardware for the supply of construction materials at Auyuittuq National Park, Pangnirtung, Nunavut.
description: The supplier will provide lumber and small hardware for an upcoming construction project at Auyuittuq National Park, Pangnirtung, Nunavut with a delivery of March 31st 2023 to Parks Canada Watersways at 1840 Bourgogne Ave., Chambly, QC J3L 1Z3
